title: Namal criticises NPP’s change of stance on Indian, Chinese deals
byline: While commending President Anura Kumara Dissanayake for completing successful visits to India and China, SLPP MP Namal Rajapaksa expressed irony over the President’s decision to sign deals with Indian and Chinese companies that the National People’s Power (NPP) had previously criticised as ’’corrupt’’ during their time in the Opposition.
